emaildnsvalidate-formatvalfail: Error message displayed when the provided email address fails basic format validation.
emaildnsvalidate-ipprivres: Error message displayed when the provided email address' domain component is a private or reserved IP address.
emaildnsvalidate-nxdomain: Error message displayed when the provided email address is not a valid registered domain.
emaildnsvalidate-blacklist: Error message displayed when the provided email address' domain component is on the blacklist.
